headline: BlackRock and Partners Group Launch First-of-Its-Kind Private Markets SMA for Wealth Platforms
summary: NEW YORK, January 29, 2026--BlackRock and Partners Group today announced the launch of a multi-alternatives SMA. The first-of-its-kind solution includes three outcome-aligned SMAs, positioning financial advisors to better match clients’ objectives by efficiently allocating to private markets in a single account.

headline: Gold Tops $5,500 as Record Rally Gains Pace on Debasement Trade
summary: Precious metals have risen dramatically this year on heightened geopolitical tensions and worries about the independence of the Federal Reserve, which have supported the debasement trade.  Gold’s recent surge “reflects a rare alignment of forces rather than a single catalyst,” said Christopher Hamilton, head of client solutions for Asia-Pacific ex-Japan at asset manager Invesco Ltd. “The speed with which gold is breaking milestones underscores how quickly confidence in traditional policy tools is eroding.”  Spot gold has risen by nearly 30% this year and silver by around two-thirds, in a rapid acceleration of multiyear bull runs.

raw.headline: Gold Tops $5,500 as Record Rally Gains Pace on Debasement Trade
raw.summary: Precious metals have risen dramatically this year on heightened geopolitical tensions and worries about the independence of the Federal Reserve, which have supported the debasement trade.  Gold’s recent surge “reflects a rare alignment of forces rather than a single catalyst,” said Christopher Hamilton, head of client solutions for Asia-Pacific ex-Japan at asset manager Invesco Ltd. “The speed with which gold is breaking milestones underscores how quickly confidence in traditional policy tools is eroding.”  Spot gold has risen by nearly 30% this year and silver by around two-thirds, in a rapid acceleration of multiyear bull runs.

headline: BlackRock Stock In Focus As Rick Rieder Emerges As Fed Chair Contender
summary: Rick Rieder, BlackRock's chief investment officer of global fixed income, is reported to be the leading contender for the next Chair of the U.S. Federal Reserve. The U.S. administration is signaling that a decision could be announced soon, putting BlackRock and NYSE:BLK in the spotlight. This would be the first time a senior executive from a major asset manager is considered to lead the central bank, raising questions about Fed independence and industry ties. For BlackRock, with NYSE:BLK...
